Scripts.OnLoad:
self.text2:SetText(TMW.L["CLEU_TIMER"]) self.text2:SetWidth(self:GetParent().CLEUEvents:GetWidth() - self:GetWidth() - 35) self.setting = "CLEUDur"
TMW:CInit(self, { setting = "CLEUDur", title = TMW.L["CLEU_TIMER"], tooltip = TMW.L["CLEU_TIMER_DESC"], ModifySettingValue = function(self, value) return tonumber(value) or 0 end, })

TMW.SUG:EnableEditBox(self, "units")
self:RegisterEvent("MODIFIER_STATE_CHANGED") self.label = TMW.L["CLEU_SOURCEUNITS"] self.BackgroundText:SetWidth(self:GetWidth())
TMW:CInit(self, { setting = "SourceUnit", title = TMW.L["CLEU_SOURCEUNITS"], tooltip = function() if IsModifierKeyDown() then return TMW.UNITS:GetUnitInputDetailedTooltip(self) else return TMW.L["CLEU_SOURCEUNITS_DESC"] end end, OnTextChanged = function(self) self:GetParent():AdjustHeight() end, doCleanString = true, })

TMW.SUG:EnableEditBox(self, "units")
self:RegisterEvent("MODIFIER_STATE_CHANGED") self.label = TMW.L["CLEU_DESTUNITS"] self.BackgroundText:SetWidth(self:GetWidth())
TMW:CInit(self, { setting = "DestUnit", title = TMW.L["CLEU_DESTUNITS"], tooltip = function() if IsModifierKeyDown() then return TMW.UNITS:GetUnitInputDetailedTooltip(self) else return TMW.L["CLEU_DESTUNITS_DESC"] end end, OnTextChanged = function(self) self:GetParent():AdjustHeight() end, doCleanString = true, })

self.Header:SetText(TMW.L["CONFIGPANEL_CLEU_HEADER"])
TMW.IE:DistributeFrameAnchorsLaterally(self, 2, self.CLEUDur, self.CLEUNoRefresh) self.CLEUDur:SetPoint("LEFT", 8, 0)
self.CLEUNoRefresh:ConstrainLabel(self, "RIGHT")
self.CLEUDur.text2:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.CLEUNoRefresh, "LEFT") self.CLEUDur.text2:SetHeight(30)
function self:AdjustHeight() self:SetHeight(75 + self.SourceUnit:GetHeight() + self.DestUnit:GetHeight()) end
